Articles.Content:
Javascript is disabled. View full album

I drive semi-trucks for a living, I managed to catch a load going from North Carolina to Mississippi, and yes I took a detour out of route to make it to Atlanta.

I'm dressed as Derpy Kerman, and there were a lot of game fans there who immediately recognized the costume.

I have over 400 pictures on my phone, it was an awesome event. I'm looking forward to next year!

Edited September 6, 2015 by Xyphos
